topics.body: Fun story. I had a cat growing up. Her name was Myra. She was always a flippant girl. But whenever bedtime rolled around she would sit at the foot of my bed meowing over and over again. She only stopped meowing when I layed down beside her so she could place her paw in my chin. I actually slept in my bed upside-down because of a cat.
